name: Mobile Dialer
short_description: Mobile dialer software makes the Smartphone activated with VoIP technology and lets one enjoy the benefits of regular calls such as Speed dial, Call hold, Call forward, Mute option, free calling etc. Additionally, one can also benefit from the additional benefits including the instantaneous information with reference to the account balance, time spent, call rate, which one can get at the same time, when one makes these kinds of calls.
